          <title>
            <string language="en">Attenuation in the core of a monomode fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verminderung im Kern einer monomode Faser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atténuation dans le noyau d'une fibre 
monomodale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atenuação no núcleo de uma fibra monomode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attenuazione nel nucleo di una fibra monomode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μείωση στον πυρήνα μιας monomode ίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atenuación en la base de una fibra monomode</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship of wavelength and attenuation for the core glass in an optic fibre.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attenuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">core glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fibre core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monomode fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optic fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">power loss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis der 
Wellenlänge und der Verminderung für das Kernglas in einer 
Optikfaser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport de la 
longueur d'onde et de l'atténuation pour le verre de noyau dans une 
fibre optique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento do 
wavelength e da atenuação para o vidro do núcleo em uma fibra 
ótica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto della 
lunghezza d'onda e dell'attenuazione per il vetro di nucleo in una 
fibra ottica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
του μήκους κύματος και της μείωσης για το γυαλί πυρήνων σε μια 
οπτική ίνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo de la 
longitud de onda y de la atenuación para el cristal de la base en una
fibra óptica.</string>
          </description>
